stimulusHtml: Which of the following factors best explains these differing interpretations?

features.html: When Astrid wears a bright red dress on New Year’s Day, her friends believe she is trying to stand out from the crowd and get attention. However, in Astrid’s culture, the color red symbolizes good luck and happiness.

choicesHtml: How sunk-cost fallacies can lead to negative outcomes
How informational social norms influence behavior
